name: Hipparcos Catalog VR (Oculus Rift)
description:
Virtual reality app from the Hipparcos catalog, with its total content, 119,614 stars. Inspired by Olivier Manoel's web application, Stars traveler http://manoloexpo.free.fr/__experimentations/stars-traveller/2.0.0/index.html

More information about the Hipparcos catalog used:

https://www.datastro.eu/explore/dataset/hyg-stellar-database/information/?sort=-...
